result.title: Welcome to Codeforces!
result.content:
Codeforces is divided into two divisions — Division 1 and Division 2. Users with a rating below 1900 fall in division 2 and those with  ≥  1900 are in division 1

Problems are divided into 7 standard levels. In increasing order of difficulty, these are

  1. Div 2 A
  2. Div 2 B
  3. Div 2 C / Div 1 A
  4. Div 2 D / Div 1 B
  5. Div 2 E / Div 1 C
  6. Div 1 D
  7. Div 1 E

Problems from past contests can be found under here

On the bottom right corner of a problem page, you will find a link to the tutorial for the problem.

You can view other people's solution under the "status" tab on a problem page and then filtering the result based on which problem's solution you want.

I will post links to good resources and some harder problems for those interested over here.

We can discuss solutions to problems we solve in the comments below :)

-Aditya
